div.p: a one-character alphanumeric column that provides the normal site or method by which a drug is administered, such as oral, injection, or topical. A GCRT is associated to each GCN_SEQNO to identify that component of the generic drug formulation.

description.value: GCRT Route of Administration Code (1-character) a one-character alphanumeric column that provides the normal site or method by which a drug is administered, such as oral, injection, or topical. A GCRT is associated to each GCN_SEQNO to identify that component of the generic drug formulation.
